origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'SemiconductorData.get_logistics_cost', 'description': 'Get the logistics cost data for a semiconductor company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the semiconductor company.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'logistics_cost', 'description': 'A dictionary containing logistics cost data for the company.'}]}, {'name': 'SemiconductorData.get_logistics_efficiency', 'description': 'Get the logistics efficiency data for a semiconductor company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the semiconductor company.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'logistics_efficiency', 'description': 'A dictionary containing logistics efficiency data for the company.'}]}, {'name': 'SemiconductorData.get_logistics_risk', 'description': 'Get the logistics risk data for the global semiconductor industry.', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'logistics_risk', 'description': 'A dictionary containing logistics risk data for the global semiconductor industry.'}]}, {'name': 'SemiconductorData.generate_logistics_report', 'description': 'Generate a logistics analysis report based on provided data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'A dictionary containing logistics cost, efficiency, and risk data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'A detailed logistics analysis report.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想分析2024年全球半导体行业的供应链物流状况。首先，获取Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.的物流成本数据。然后，获取Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.的物流效率数据。接着，获取全球半导体行业的物流风险数据。最后，提供基于这些数据的供应链物流分析报告。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.的物流成本数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'company'的值是什么?
